short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clippy is a Chrome Extension to Sync your clipboard across all your devices

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Clipboard in the cloud.
Increase your productivity with Clippy, the cloud clipboard that links all your devices. Seamlessly share text, images, and files across devices by synchronizing your clipboard. Copy on one device, paste on another, and let Clippy handle the rest. Say goodbye to emailing images to yourself and struggling to send files to your phone. Effortlessly move content between devices with Clippy.
